children.text: (a) The General Services Administration is responsible for establishing and operating the FAR Secretariat to print, publish, and distribute the FAR through the Code of Federal Regulations system (including a loose-leaf edition with periodic updates).
(b) Additionally, the FAR Secretariat shall provide the two councils with centralized services forâ€”
(1) Keeping a synopsis of current FAR cases and their status;
(3) Assisting parties interested in reviewing the files on completed cases; and
(4) Performing miscellaneous administrative tasks pertaining to the maintenance of the FAR.
